name: Scrapped (YoukaiDrawing, anivire)
description:
Barren desert, strange shadow creatures surround you, but do not despair, because robots will always help in a difficult situation! Get scrap, charge beacons and build unlockable robo-friends to survive!

🤔 Web-version  is unstable, play windows version to get full experience!

Useful tips to success in game 😎:
1. After unlock all robots continue charge beacons for upgrade all robots from 1 tier to 3 tier. Robots scale damage and max HP with every tier.
2. Always move, always.
3. Appreciate your resources, they are not infinite.
